reviewText: I have been addicted to Harlequin movies since i stumbled on them. I know they are made in the 90's but i still like them. :) So far The Waiting Game is my favorite
I liked the movie. I am a fan of Chandra West. She did a really good job in the movie.
I gave this movie only 3 stars. It was an ok movie. I did receive it on the day promised. I am always satisfied with everything I have purchased from Amazon.

For some reason I just enjoy the Harlequin novels turned to movies. They are definitely not Oscar winning material but personally I enjoy them just the same. This one is not amongst my favorites but it is alright and for the price I say it was worth it to me.
